data: ONCS AMB Nasogastric Tube Feeding (Day of Treatment)

REFEEDING SYNDROME ASSESSMENT  No Risk: No weight loss; eating usual diet  Low Risk: 1 minor risk factor  High Risk: 2 minor risk factors OR 1 major risk factor  Very High Risk: BMI < 14kg/m2, negligible intake > 15 days, or weight loss > 20%    NOTE: Inpatient refeeding management required if one or more of the following present:  - Very high risk of refeeding syndrome  - Clinical significant oral dysfunction (renal, pulmonary, cardiac, hepatic)  - Obtaining necessary bloodwork problematic  - K, PO4, or Mg outside normal range and unable to be corrected in a timely manner  - GI symptoms (nausea, vomiting, diarrhea) impeding oral intake / electrolyte replacement

MINOR RISK FACTORS  - BMI < 18.5 kg/m2  - Unintentional weight loss > 10% within the last 3 – 6 months  - Little or no nutritional intake for > 5 days  - History of alcohol abuse, or drugs including insulin, chemotherapy, antacids, or diuretics  MAJOR RISK FACTORS  - BMI < 16 kg/m2  - Unintentional weight loss > 15% within the last 3 – 6 months  - Little or no nutritional intake for > 10 days  - Low serum potassium, phosphate, or magnesium prior to feed
Ensure prescription ordered for prophylactic antimicrobials, tube feed occlusion, analgesia, electrolyte repletion and refeeding risk if needed
325 mg, NG-tube, qdaily, PRN for tube feed occlusion.  Give with pancrelipase, order duration: 30 day, drug form: tab, dispense qty: 30 tab
1 tab, NG-tube, qdaily, PRN for tube feed occlusion. Give with sodium bicarbonate, order duration: 30 day, drug form: tab, dispense qty: 30 tab
100 mg, NG-tube, BID, drug form: tab, order duration: 10 days, dispense qty: 20 tab
100 mg, PO, BID, drug form: tab, order duration: 10 days, dispense qty: 20 tab
1 tab, NG-tube, qdaily, drug form: tab, dispense qty: 10 tab
1 tab, PO, qdaily, drug form: tab, dispense qty: 10 tab
25 mEq, NG-tube, BID, PRN electrolyte repletion, drug form: tab-effervescent, dispense qty: 10 tab
25 mEq, PO, BID, PRN electrolyte repletion, drug form: tab-effervescent, dispense qty: 10 tab
150 mg 30 mL, NG-tube, TID, PRN electrolyte repletion, drug form: oral liq, dispense qty: 1 bottle
150 mg 30 mL, PO, TID, PRN electrolyte repletion, drug form: oral liq, dispense qty: 1 bottle
sodium acid phosphate 500 mg oral tablet, effervescent
500 mg, NG-tube, BID, PRN electrolyte repletion, drug form: tab, dispense qty: 20 tab
500 mg, PO, BID, PRN electrolyte repletion, drug form: tab, dispense qty: 20 tab
